overview: Rich joined Arts Alliance Media in February 2003 to oversee early digital cinema trials across the UKâ€™s City Screen cinema circuit, and to provide technical expertise to deliver AAMâ€™s successful bid for the UK Film Councilâ€™s Digital Screen Network project. Rich was responsible for delivering the technical solutions behind this ground-breaking network, from projection and playout systems integration to content preparation and distribution systems.
